problem_text_cn: 如图,AB、AC是⊙O的两条弦,∠A=30°,过点C的切线与OB的延长线交于点D,则∠D的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB and AC are the two chords of ⊙O, ∠A = N_0, the tangent line passing vertex C and the extended line of OB intersect at vertex D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理、切线的性质,解题的关键是求出∠COD的度数．
